thread.title: Megan McKenna goes clubbing WITHOUT her underwear as she puts Pete Wicks split behind her
thread.title_full: Megan McKenna goes clubbing WITHOUT her underwear as she puts Pete Wicks split behind her

author: Emmeline Saunders
title: Megan McKenna goes clubbing WITHOUT her underwear as she puts Pete Wicks split behind her
text:
Megan McKenna goes clubbing WITHOUT her underwear as she puts Pete Wicks split behind her The TOWIE star stepped out in a very risqué dress for the girls' night out Share Click to play Tap to play The video will start in 8 Cancel Play now Megan McKenna breaks down over Pete Wicks Share this video Get celebs updates directly to your inbox + Subscribe Thank you for subscribing! Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email 
Megan McKenna left her underwear at home when she headed out for a big night out with her friends. 
She put the recent drama surrounding her split from Pete Wicks behind her as she stepped out in a form-fitting orange dress that left no room for her undies. 
The lace-up sides of her frock were carefully placed to avoid any potentially embarrassing wardrobe malfunctions, but the star still showed a hint of side boob while she was dancing in the Aristokrat London club. Megan steps out in the lace-up number (Photo: 128232-5) (Photo: Instagram) 
Megan was out with her TOWIE co-stars Amber Turner, Yazmin Oukhellou and another pal, and it turned out the love interests of all three TOWIE girls were ALSO there - Pete, Dan Edgar and James Locke. 
"My Gals," Megan captioned a snap of her friends after they'd finished getting ready. 
But the night didn't end well as she was spotted getting upset and talking on her phone outside the Mayfair club. Megan was seen getting upset outside the club (Photo: 128232-5) 
Pete was also seen in conversation with a mystery woman, and Megan reportedly saw them chatting together. 
An eyewitness said: "Pete made sure he was not pictured near Megan, and ended the night appearing to talk to a few different pretty women from the club. 
"Megan ended the night very upset, and was seen comforted by friends and anxiously talking on her phone. The group left together with a lot of other friends at 3am." Pete was also seen talking to a mystery woman (Photo: 128232-5) 
In Wednesday night's episode, the couple – who have been dating for a year – decided to call things off after weeks of stressful arguments. 
Megan got upset as she revealed how she couldn't get over Pete's sexting six months ago and thought he blamed her for something missing in their relationship. 
The moving scenes even had viewers in tears after Megan admitted to her boyfriend that she was no longer in love with him, prompting Pete to get up, kiss her on the cheek and leave her flat. She was joined by Amber and another mate ahead of their night out (Photo: Instagram) 
While Megan hasn't directly addressed the situation with her followers yet, she has been dropping hints about how hard she's finding things. 
Yesterday she tweeted: "So tired all the time coz of my s**t sleeping lately." 
She added: "On a brighter note. I can't WAIT for a drink tonight." 
Later, she posted a pap shot of her walking to a car, writing next to it: "Brush it off like [manicure emoji]." Video Loading Click to play Tap to play The video will start in 8 Cancel Play now
